document_data.name: Huang Ch'ung
document_data.mainbody: '''Huang Ch'ung''' was a [[sohei]] in [[Shou Lung]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Ch'ung born in a year of great famine so his clan decided to consecrate him to the [[Dragon Monastery]] in [[Kuo Te' Lung]].
document_data.Personality: Ch'ung had never wanted to be a sohei but thought it was a suitable life for him. He took pride in his martial training. However, he was bored by the lack of temple warfare and welcomed any opportunity for an adventure.
